data.actual_result: None of the modals can be closed with the esc key
data.expected_result: Modals close when the esc key is pressed
data.short_description: Opening two modals over each other makes them unable to be closed with the esc key
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Reaction modal on a message - Right-click on a user and open their Profile - Attempt to close either modal with the esc key
